snippet: Real Madrid lost its first game of the season on Sunday as Sevilla mounted a 3-2 comeback victory at home.
abstract: Soccer Roundup; Sevilla defeats Real Madrid, 3-2; other soccer results and news noted.
lead_paragraph: Real Madrid lost its first game of the season on Sunday as Sevilla mounted a 3-2 comeback victory at home.

headline.main: Real Madrid’s First Loss Lets Barcelona Move Atop League
headline.print_headline: Real Madrid’s First Loss Lets Barcelona Move Atop League
